Judul: THE IMPORTANCE OF PE RSPECTIVE IN CONCEPT UAL  THINKING AND VISUAL COMMUNICA TION
Abstrak:
With this paper we want to illustrate the importance of perspective in visual  communication  not  only  in  art  history,  finding  some  models  which  may  be founded  in  the  Renaissance,  inspired  by  the  rigor,  the  illusion  of  the  space suggested by the use of perspective, which influenced modern and present thinking. Among the philosophers who wrote and tried to understand the concept of space as well as the concept of image, referring to and being influenced by the models and elements  in  the  Renaissance  period  are Paul  Deussen,  Immanuel  Kant,  and  Ernst Cassirer. Also  we  approach  elements  from  the  art  of  perspective pertaining  to  the philosophy of perception and to semiotics.
Throughout the process we demonstrate the value and importance of perspective to conceptual thinking, of the use of some renaissance elements in  philosophical and semiotic  studies and  their  role in  visual 
communication.
Kata Kunci: perspective; visual communication; art; semiotic; philosophy;  space
